SOURCE Julie Jones
A new vocabulary book improves child's grades in 30 days or less instead of years which is the popular belief.
NEWARK, N.J. , Oct. 20, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- In the new book, Vocabulary to Teach Kids by Julie Jones , the author details how parents can improve their child's grades in 30 days or less. The book is part of a system.
Photo - http://photos.prnewswire.com/prnh/20151020/278654
"As a parent, I'm very busy as all parents are, but it is important to provide vital homework support at home, so I designed the book to fit into a parent's busy schedule so that they can improve their child's reading comprehension and vocabulary in 30 days or less as long as you follow the step-by-step instructions included in the book," said Julie Jones .
Reading Comprehension is Tough for Kids
Most of the confusion children have around assignments is comprehension. This book teaches them the prefixes they need to know to understand the most common words used in children's textbooks and school work. By knowing these prefixes, your child will have an improved vocabulary and increased reading comprehension because your child will be able to understand most common words which will also improve your child's grades and standardized test scores.
Vocabulary to Teach Kids includes 3 chapters:
1) a Parent letter
2) a Student Letter
3) Lessons
Each chapter helps parents or teachers improve the child's reading comprehension and vocabulary. The letters explain in detail what the parent or teacher or student needs to do to get the desired results from the book when completing each of the lessons. The lessons have 5 activities each.
"Students get interventions such as support labs, 504s, for slow learning disabilities and poor grades. The book Vocabulary to Teach Kids helps those students tremendously by improving their reading comprehension and vocabulary in 30 days or less," said Julie Jones .
Helps Students Compete in the Global Community of the 21st Century
In the US there are millions of students in public schools and in order for them to compete in the new global economy they must learn the important vocabulary words found in textbooks and school work. This book strives to provide this solution in 30 days or less. It also helps students who don't need an intervention, but want to improve their child's grades.
"The game changing system improves your child's grades in 30 days or less. I used the step-by-step system to improve my own child's grades. Before developing this system, I had tremendous problems helping my child with homework. I tried all types of systems and tutoring services but nothing seemed to work. Now, I'm able to help him easily. You can now have the same results," said Julie Jones , the author.
In the 21st Century, when kids grow up, they will have to compete globally for jobs. The US has been falling in scores against other nations, Vocabulary to Teach Kids improves vocabulary and reading comprehension so that all students can compete with other nations better. A good vocabulary can help your child improve their reading comprehension and understand unfamiliar words better which results in better grades and standardized test scores which is important to their academic life as well as life in general especially with communication skills.
The book is available on amazon.com at http://www.amazon.com/gp/aw/d/0984249311?me=&ref=olp_product_details . You can visit the author's website at http://www.beststudentsuccesseries.com where you can sign up for free resources and learn more about the book.
